author: carnold
msg: Bug 40951: Add MSG00001.bin to dist, ASF notice to Javadoc

author: smilek
msg: added desktop_print layout templates (both vm and jsp versions) to tigris and blueocean layout decorations

author: smilek
msg: added support for portlet print-mode, which is displayed in a popup window - and an alternate layout decoration template has been added to tigris and blueocean to produce a view which excludes header and all menus - in print-mode, GetPageAction ajaxapi is called with new parameters (layoutid and entity) to retrieve a reduced version of the page psml containing only the parent layout fragment and the one portlet fragment that is to be displayed in print-mode

author: smilek
msg: added switches to disable window move (drag) and window resize via portlet decoration properties (these switches are automatically set when viewing a portlet in print-mode)
